lead_paragraph: Connecticut said it self-reported a secondary violation of N.C.A.A. rules involving Maya Moore. The violation occurred in 2005, when the women’s basketball office arranged for Moore to tour ESPN in Bristol. The university said it learned of the violation last year, and recently completed a review, resulting in the university reporting it to the N.C.A.A.
